definition: loan on favorable terms/concessionary loan/soft loan

sentences.english: Carmack said Id turned down many offers from large publishers over the years.
sentences.chinese: 卡馬克說號拒絕了許多優惠大出版商多年來。

sentences.english: Mancheng County's investment policy preferences, relaxed environment.
sentences.chinese: 滿城縣的招商引資政策優惠，環境寬鬆。

sentences.english: All above offers are bound by relevant terms and conditions.
sentences.chinese: 以上所有優惠須受有關條款及細則約束。

sentences.english: Also the limited-time offers, which make you feel like you have to take advantage of a special deal.
sentences.chinese: 也要當心限時優惠，這會讓你感到佔了便宜。

sentences.english: Does tax preference transition period exist when foreign-funded enterprises deposit additional funds.
sentences.chinese: 外商投資企業追加投資是否存在稅收優惠過渡期？

sentences.english: Article 46 Privately-run schools shall enjoy preferential taxation policy formulated by the State.
sentences.chinese: 第四十六條民辦學校享受國家規定的稅收優惠政策。

sentences.english: If you do not want to receive our promotion material, please click here.
sentences.chinese: 假如閣下不希望再收到星島日報優惠電郵，請按此處。

sentences.english: So we have transport facilities, labor force, preferential polities as well as abundant raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 原材料充足，勞動資源豐富，交通便利，政策優惠。

sentences.english: The park has complete matching facilities and preferential policies, and is managed by enclosed type.
sentences.chinese: 區內各類配套設施齊全，政策優惠，實行封閉式管理。

sentences.english: I have a coupon for buy a hamburger get one on free.
sentences.chinese: 我有一張買一個漢堡就送一個的優惠卷。

sentences.english: The coupon is valid at ELEMENTS shop only.
sentences.chinese: 優惠劵只適用於圓方店。

sentences.english: Convenience and benefit, favorable price to customer satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 便民利民，價格優惠，讓客戶滿意。

sentences.english: Let’s discuss some of the best ways to find online coupons.
sentences.chinese: 先民，就讓我們來討論一些淘到網絡優惠券的好方法。

sentences.english: Please send us a pattern - book and quote the lowest price for sateen .
sentences.chinese: 請寄橫貢緞樣品簿和最優惠報價單。

sentences.english: Successive previous customers can enjoy preferential measures, and please contact the organizing committee for details.
sentences.chinese: 歷屆老客戶可享受優惠措施，詳情請諮詢組委會。

sentences.english: Does the child have the discount at Western Restaurant?
sentences.chinese: 在酒店西餐廳兒童是否享有優惠？

definition: plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
to ratchet up/to raise (expectations etc)/to increase (a quota, a position in the market etc)/to up the ante/(computing) to encode
to cut prices/to discount/to mark down/price cutting
